en.title: FE's Long Drive Challenge Grand Final Saujana, 5th November 2008
en.content:
THE GRAND FINALS QUOTES:

"WOW, WOW, WOW!".

“So much pressure wow!”.

“Unbelievable!”.

"What a Rush!”.

"Fantastic event! Hope we can host it again next year, Thank you Jean!" Saujana GCC.

"Thank you for introducing Malaysia to the world of long drive. Great job!" NST.

11am and the juniors are ready to rock and roll. Mohd Azman stood on the tee with his family looking on. They just drove through the night from Kedah just to see their son crush the winning drive of 308.7 yards. It was a long wait but the pressure of the finals seemed to get the better of all the rest. Favourites like Daniel Loh Ming Wei and Ilyia Jamil had to shoot out for 3rd place.

The ladies were up next with the early leader and National record holder Cindy Koh Yeen Leng having to wait till the last competitor June Yap to knock her off her perch and tack the finals with a final drive of 225.6 yards.

With all the press including TV3, NTV7, NST Star ,Par Golf, Golf Digest, Malay Mail to name a few, the pressures of the Grand Finals seemed to affect the seniors the most with many of the favourites, including the National Record Holder Paul Ow Chee Cheoon, all failing to hit the fairway. In front of a packet tee with almost no room for any more spectators, Zakaria Mohd got onto the tee and crushed the winning shot of 282 yards to great applause.

The Open Finals is what everyone was waiting for. The leader board changed consistently. The crowd support was unbelievable, but the pressure of the big stage soon sorted the men from the boys. Justin Wong Jie Hau's winning drive was so spectacular and powerful that he snapped his driver in two. Favourite Divan Du Piesanie put up a great fight and really got the crowd going with a fired up 6 balls.

Overall the whole event was a Great Success and Fusion Excel's Long Drive Golf Challenge is here to stay!

Final Results:
 

Open Division

 Yards

1st Justin Wong Jie Hau

329.2

2nd Divan Du Piesanie

327.6

3rd Ooi Cheong Chee

316.1

4th Nicholas Leong

311.1

5th Ku Sairy Ku Din

310.9

6th Eagle K K Lee

306.0

7th Rizam Ali (PRO)

304.4

8th Hanafiah Jamil (PRO)

300.9

 

 

Senior Division

Yards

1st Zakaria Mohd

282.0

2nd AJK Subramanyah (PRO)

280.8

3rd Eric Tan Swee Seng (PRO)

278.7

 

 

Junior Division

Yards

1st Mohd Azman

308.7

2nd Low Kah Hing

298.8

3rd Daniel Loh Ming Wei

297.3

 

 

Women Division

Yards

1st June Yap

225.6

2nd Irene Teng

223.0

3rd Cindy Koh Yeen Leng

222.0
